ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 13 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Panasonic Lumix DMC-GX7 Micro Four Thirds Digital Camera with 14-42mm II Lens + <2> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card + <3> Spare DMW-BLG10 Battery +
<4> Vivitar 46mm UV Glass Filter + <5> PD 50" Compact Travel Tripod + <6> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens +
<7> PD-C15 Camera / Camcorder Case + <8> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <9> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<10> LCD Screen Protectors + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> Image Recovery Software + <13> 46-52mm Step-Up Adapter Ring
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix DMC-GX7 Micro Four Thirds Digital Camera with 14-42mm II Lens with 32GB Card + Battery + Case + Filter + Tripod + Tele/Wide Lenses Kit
